'Whitey' Bulger found guilty of 11 murders

Convicted of racketeering, extortion

A jury has found notorious gangster James "Whitey" Bulger responsible for 11 of the 19 murder charges against him. The 83-year-old was also found guilty of extortion and money laundering. (2:26 p.m.)

    Sinkhole causes resort villa in Florida to partially collapse
